function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of infection through wearable technology","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission from infected individuals to medical staff and others","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for wearable devices and regular disinfection","Technologies":"Wearable technology with built-in disinfection features, remote monitoring and data transmission","People":"Medical staff, patients, researchers","Owner":"Healthcare institutes, wearable sensor companies, researchers"},{"Description":"Reliance on AI for outcome prediction","Impact":"Inaccurate or unreliable predictions leading to incorrect treatment decisions","Mitigation":"Regular validation and calibration of AI models, involvement of human experts in treatment decisions","Technologies":"AI algorithms, human expertise, validation frameworks","People":"Doctors, healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutes, AI developers, researchers"},{"Description":"Dependence on remote monitoring and data transmission","Impact":"Potential for data breaches and privacy concerns, leading to misuse of patient data","Mitigation":"Strong data encryption, compliance with privacy regulations, continuous security monitoring","Technologies":"Data encryption tools, privacy compliance frameworks, security monitoring systems","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, researchers","Owner":"Healthcare institutes, IT professionals, researchers"}]}
